skillTree.localised_description: A specially-engineered breed of Rat Ogre, the Bonebreaker has a braced platform strapped or bolted to its back for carrying a Skaven Warlord to battle.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This is a unit created by Clan Moulder. Packmasters and Throt the Unclean can push it to its full combat potential and restore it in battle.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: The ascension up the greasy pole of the Skaven military hierarchy starts in the brood.
A lifetime spent witnessing the ramifications of others falling short of a Warlord’s expectations makes the fear of failure all-consuming.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -15%
	(enemy characters in region)

ui_effects.localised_text: ➕ Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: "Yes-yes, it is deadly to attack mighty Warlord! Great Horned One watches over him-him!"

effects.description:
On turn start, Lords have a chance to gain 1 loyalty
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 5
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 10
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero
Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "I keep them sharp, yes-yes. Always ready for the challenge that I know is coming, yes-yes!"
"When they come for you, go straight for the throat and tear it clean out. They won't come again."
"Most precious of all substances, the pulse of our life."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -12% for Warpfire Thrower, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit ignores speed and combat penalties caused by terrain and can move through trees.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.
Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
